```{r}
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
df <- read.csv("training_df.csv")
df$homeTeam <- factor(df$homeTeam)
df$awayTeam <- factor(df$awayTeam)
df
```
```{r}
model <- lm(price~ homeTeam + awayTeam + ticket_count + days_to_game, data = df)
model
```
```{r}
summary(model)
```
